animeDescription: A transfer student only just arrives and is confronted by the school gang. One by one he defeats the gang members and challenges their leader to a fight. Each 10 minute episode aired Monday through Saturday.   (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Kinoshita Renzo', ['Episode Director', 'Animation Director']], ['Yukimuro Shunichi', ['Script']], ['Okaseko Nobuhiro', ['Animation Director']]]
